  2. Earth Has A 1-In-100,000 Chance Of Being Ejected From The Solar System Due To A Passing Star  IFLScience
  3. A passing star could fling Earth out of orbit  Science News
  4. Scientists Fear a Passing Star Could Fling Earth Out of the Sun's Orbit, Into the Frigid Expanse Beyond  Yahoo News
  5. Passing stars could have a significant impact on the future of our solar system  Phys.org
